GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of the article requested by its article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, that can be filtered by the allowed queries

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with passed article_id

comments.author: Roald Dahl
comments.body: I write for kids and adults alike

POST /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the comments table associated with the passed article_id, and returns the added comment

comment.author: Roald Dahl
comment.body: I write for kids and adults alike

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: updates the votes on an article by incrementing the existing vote count by the number sent, and returns the updated article

updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge
updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the comments table according to the comment_id passed; returns no response

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
